title: Conversion as Psychological Transformation, Process and Goals
description:
Christians have long talked about conversion. You won't hear that language much in psychology. Their term is "transformation". In studying transformations the interest in is process (how to initiate) but what we're really interested in are the goals of transformation. What are we going to be transformed INTO! 

Meaning Crisis 13 https://youtu.be/vGB8k7jk1AQ
JBP on Firing Line https://youtu.be/DfnF4c4EhdE
Tim Keller on preaching to the heart https://youtu.be/SWe1E8AMMr8
JBP on Piaget Equilibrated state https://youtu.be/XbOeO_frzvg
Bret Weinstein on Rebel Wisdom
Jordan Peterson and Sam Harris Vancouver 1 https://youtu.be/d-Z9EZE8kpo
Famous Conversion https://www.amazon.com/Famous-Conversions-Mr-Hugh-Kerr/dp/0802840655
Century of Self https://youtu.be/DnPmg0R1M04
One Last Question https://youtu.be/afSQZweYDts

#jordanpeterson #johnvervaeke #meaningcrisis
